Hero.header: The CV builder that helps you land your dream job
Hero.subtitle: Choose a professional template, fill in your details, and download your CV for free. No login or hidden fees.

TemplatesSection.subtitle: Free, clean, and tailored to your industry.

FeaturesSection.header: Customize Your CV to Fit Your Needs
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Complete control over your document's appearance.

card1.text: Create a free account to store up to 5 different CV versions and access them from any device.

card2.text: Download your final document in high-quality A4 format, guaranteed to pass Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

card3.text: Change font size, line spacing, and margins to ensure everything fits perfectly on a single page.

card4.text: Add non-standard categories, such as 'Projects' or 'Volunteering'. Reorder your sections with a single drag-and-drop.

StepsSection.header: Your CV ready in 3 simple steps
StepsSection.subtitle: Our builder will guide you through the whole process.

card1.text: Browse free designs and pick one that suits your industry.

card2.text: Enter your details, add custom sections, and adjust font size. You have full control over the layout.

card3.text: Save your finished CV to your drive and send it to the employer.

Footer.text: The best free online CV builder
